mapper.insert: insert into x$statements_with_sorting (db, exec_count, total_latency, sort_merge_passes, avg_sort_merges, sorts_using_scans, sort_using_range, rows_sorted, avg_rows_sorted, first_seen, last_seen, digest, query) values (#{db,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalLatency,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sortMergePasses,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avgSortMerges,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sortsUsingScans,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sortUsingRange,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rowsSorted,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avgRowsSorted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firstSeen,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastSeen,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{digest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{query,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select db, exec_count, total_latency, sort_merge_passes, avg_sort_merges, sorts_using_scans, sort_using_range, rows_sorted, avg_rows_sorted, first_seen, last_seen, digest, query from x$statements_with_sorting
